name: Divide by Squares
description:
This is a tricky puzzle game that will test your brain! There are levels designed for beginners as well as advanced brains. Only the smartest will be able to do all of the levels on the highest level! Can you?

Features:
- 200 Brain teasing levels
- 4 Levels of difficulty
- Improve your cognitive ability
- Get hints to help solve levels
- A fun new kind of puzzle to solve!
- 100% Free to Play!
